wikipedia_page.main:
Frederick Godber, 1st Baron Godber (6 November 1888 – 10 April 1976), was a British petroleum executive.Godber was Chairman and Managing Director of Shell. He was Knighted 7 July 1942. He was raised to the peerage as Baron Godber, of Mayfield in the County of Sussex, in 1956. He had already been made a Grand Officer of the Order of Orange-Nassau in 1948.He married Violet Lovesey: they had two daughters, Joy and Daphne(1923-2020). She married Ian Debenham DFC. 
Lord Godber died in April 1976, aged 87, when the barony became extinct. He was buried at St Dunstan Churchyard, Mayfield, Sussex.
